--- layout: api # ----- API DOCUMENTATION ----- title: Delete Template method: DELETE path: template/:templateKey sample: false # do not add response envelope fields, they're automatically included response: - [] status: fields: [statusCode, statusMessage] values: - [200, "Ok"] - [401, "Unauthorized; missing or invalid API key."] - [404, "Request failed; template key does not exist."] # ----------------------------- ---

Delete the specified template. It can take up to 5 minutes for the template caches to clear, just in case you need to verify the template was deleted.
